message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. I believe it would be incredibly beneficial for you. I'm asking for $14,000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only afford to pay up to $12,000. Could we meet somewhere in the middle?
Hi Bob, thanks for your response. I understand your position, but $12,000 is a bit too low for me.  Could you meet me at $13,000?
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I still feel that $12,000 would be more in line with my budget. Would you be open to meeting me halfway at $12,500?
